Deprecated API

Deprecated Methods
com.ibm.tspaces.TupleSpace.connectionTries(int)
          Use setConnectionTries 
com.ibm.tspaces.TupleSpace.connectionWaitTime(int)
          Use setConnectionTries 
com.ibm.tspaces.Field.formal()
          Use isFormal() 
com.ibm.tspaces.TupleSpace.in(Tuple)
          Use waitToTake() instead. 
com.ibm.tspaces.TupleSpace.inp(SuperTuple)
          Use take() instead. 
com.ibm.tspaces.Field.name()
          Use getName() 
com.ibm.tspaces.TupleSpace.out(Tuple)
          Use write() instead 
com.ibm.tspaces.TupleSpace.setClosingDownByForcingFinalizers(boolean)
          No longer does anything - Use appletEnvoronment(true) 
com.ibm.tspaces.Field.setFormal()
          Use setFormal(true) 
com.ibm.tspaces.SuperTuple.setFormal(int)
          Use the form setFormal(i,true) 
com.ibm.tspaces.SuperTuple.setFormal(String)
          Use the form setFormal(name,true) 
com.ibm.tspaces.TupleSpace.setUserName(String, String)
          There are new static setUser and setPassword methods 
com.ibm.tspaces.SuperTuple.template()
          Since we no longer differentiate between "formal" and "actual" tuples, this is no longer useful. 
com.ibm.tspaces.Field.type()
          Use getType() 
com.ibm.tspaces.Field.value()
          Use getValue()
